snippet: New books include “Cocktail Noir: From Gangsters and Gin Joints to Gumshoes and Gimlets” and “A Is for Arsenic: The Poisons of Agatha Christie.”
abstract: Marilyn Stasio reviews books Cocktail Noir: From Gangsters and Gin Joints to Gumshoes and Gimlets by Scott M Deitche, A is for Arsenic: The Poisons of Agatha Christie by Kathryn Harkup, The Mystery Writers of America Cookbook edited by Kate White and Prison Ramen: Recipes and Stories From Behind Bars by Clifton Collins Jr. and Gustavo (Goose) Alvarez.
lead_paragraph: New books include “Cocktail Noir: From Gangsters and Gin Joints to Gumshoes and Gimlets” and “A Is for Arsenic: The Poisons of Agatha Christie.”
